scrapper

Class Authentifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrapper.Authentifier

  • public class Authentifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements OAuth2 for a Reddit access. The first time, it retrieves a permanent token (masterToken), via a manual code verification. This token is related to the user of the application, so it must be personal and kept secret. Then, for each use, it generates a temporary token by refreshing the masterToken. Doc at https://github.com/reddit/reddit/wiki/OAuth2
    Author:
    Yohan Chalier

    • Method Detail

      • getLock

        public java.lang.Object getLock()

      • auth

        public boolean auth()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Tries to refresh the token using the permanent token stored in FILE_TOKEN (by default token_json). To retrieve the token, either the code has been fetched already, in which case we just need to send a request to Reddit, or not, in which case we need to ask for a code.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateString

        private java.lang.String generateString(java.util.Random rng,
                                        java.lang.String characters,
                                        int length)
        Generates a random string given a set of characters and a length
        Parameters:
        rng - Just a new Random() object
        characters - The set of characters to include in the string
        length - The length of the string
        Returns:
        A random string of length 'length'

      • getCodeRetrievalURL

        private java.net.URL getCodeRetrievalURL()
                                  throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Replaces placeholders in the code retrieval URL, and store the generated seed for future verification. See the doc for more info about the seed.
        Returns:
        The code retrieval URL
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • retrieveCodeServerOut

        private boolean retrieveCodeServerOut()
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Asks Reddit for a verification code. Generates the URL to retrieve the code from, and opens URL. The server thread should handle the response from Reddit online API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Server

      • retrieveCodeServerIn

        public void retrieveCodeServerIn(java.lang.String code,
                                 java.lang.String seed)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles the data received by the temporary server when the redirect_uri request happens. The auth() method previously called that executed retrieveCodeServerOut has ended. So now that we have the code, we need to re-start it to retrieve the token (only if the seed matches)
        Parameters:
        code - The code given by Reddit
        seed - The seed associated with the request, that must match the stored seed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getAuthHeader

        private java.lang.String getAuthHeader()
        Builds the authentication header for a basic HTTP authentication. See doc.
        Returns:
        The string header for the request property "Authorization"
        See Also:
        Connection

      • getAuthParametersRetrieval

        private java.lang.String getAuthParametersRetrieval()
                                             throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Builds the authentication POST parameters for the token retrieval once the code has been retrieved.
        Returns:
        The string containing relevant parameters according to the doc.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • getTokenRetrievalResponse

        private org.json.JSONObject getTokenRetrievalResponse(java.lang.String parameters)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      org.json.JSONException
        Initializes the connection for the token retrieval/refreshing, and returns the so obtained response.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The POST parameters required by the API
        Returns:
        The received token as a JSON
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException

      • retrieveToken

        private void retrieveToken()
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           org.json.JSONException
        The code must be initialized. Retrieves the permanent token and saves it.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException

      • refreshToken

        private void refreshToken()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          org.json.JSONException
        The masterToken must be initialized. Refreshes the token.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException
